    • changeItemQuantity

      public int changeItemQuantity (int itemID, int quantity)
      Method to change quantity of an Item in basket table in database
      Parameters:
      itemID - - Integer representing the Item ID of item to have quantity changed
      quantity - - Integer representing the new quantity
      Returns:
      - Returns integer representing if database update worked, 1 for success, 0 for failure
